songs.title: KevinLovesYou
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, the year is 2012
Okay, alright, real quick

[Verse 1]
Exhibit A, the never-ending story
Follow me while I try to get the glory
Girl at the door seems to ignore me, uh, uh, uh
It's not right, and the whole world know it
But when she smiles she keeps the whole world glowing
Maybe that why I am still going
Trying to get something that I know don't exist
But on my birthday, it doesn't hurt to take a wish
And maybe just, escape to freedom
Fly away with you
To another kingdom
Sing songs with catchy melodies and harmonies
I trust you, you would never harm me
This isn't reality, just memories
I remember my vivid dreams
Sometimes, even though we're bored
Nightmares, but the end
Because, you there
And, I'll stare
With, no glare
In my eyes
